element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm simplifies lines, reducing the number of vertices in each of them,

element.name: PRESERVE
element.text: Selecting this option will preserve the topology of the original lines layer .

element.name: RESULT
element.text: New lines vector layer with the name of the origin layer.

image.description: In red is the layer with the simplified lines from the original lines layer in green.
